title: Hi Riot, I'm 2 RP Short of the new Yasuo skin!!!
body:
Hi riot, 
I was purchasing the new riven and yasuo skin that you released recently, and I noticed that I was just 2 RP short of the yasuo one!  I was wondering if this http://imgur.com/gallery/E1E1D ,  my best drawing of Blood Moon Yasuo would be enough to get me that 2 RP!
Thank you,
Bauger

replies.body:
Oooooo a Blood Moon Yasuo trying to summon his counterpart Nightbringer Yasuo? I bet there could be a pretty neat fanfic to tye those two together somehow....hmmmmm......

Take another peek at your account. Rampant poros have been known to dorp small amount of RP from time to time. You might have gotten lucky and got that 2 RP!

https://i.gyazo.com/7756338ddb70f4d1dd0f72673bba303d.png
